entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:17 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries or snow squalls early in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
